Predict and Prevent Plant Downtime


We stream your data through our custom analytics platform to alert unplanned events before they happen.


Welcome to the Industrial Internet of Oil and Gas



Connects the unconnected in your plant and displays intelligent analytics to optimize efficiencies

Connects your machines, operators, and managers for a smarter digital oilfield

Streamlyne alerts, tracks, and trends major problems before it's too late



Your Plant's Down - That's A Problem


Every minute that unplanned downtime happens you:

  • Lose Money
  • Lose Control
  • Lose Productivity

Streamlyne helps solve this problem by alerting your operators and managers to potential issues so they can be proactive and not reactive.



Last month, our plant had a major “blockage” and if we had Streamlyne it could’ve predicted and helped prevent 3 days of downtime which cost us hundreds of thousands of dollars.

Early Adopter Customer of 15+ plants


Benefits

Less Downtime

Today your plant is humming along, but on the night shift a critical component malfunctions and your plant shuts down for emergency repair. Streamlyne puts the control back into the hands of your operators and managers to eliminate unplanned downtime.

Improving Safety

Having the right information at all times protects you and your employees from harm. The ability to access the latest information on assets while working on a piece of equipment is critical to safety when working with hazardous chemicals, gases, and large interworking pieces of equipment.

Better Performance

Interruptions in production and workflow directly impacts your customers. With better planning, this gives your customer the best service and experience possible.

Real-Time Data

We simplify the way oil and gas operators and managers do their jobs by analyzing and delivery new data on a mobile and web application. Having information in one place in one platform

Collaborate and Share Knowledge

New and senior employees can share knowledge on plant operations, which makes everybody and the entire company smarter.

Improving Safety

Having the right information at all times protects you and your employees from harm. The ability to access the latest information on assets while working on a piece of equipment is critical to safety when working with hazardous chemicals, gases, and large interworking pieces of equipment.
